 */export var CommerceEntityInput=function CommerceEntityInput(options){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,CommerceEntityInput);this.getApiUrl=function(url){return"".concat(msdyn365Commerce.apiSettings.baseUrl).concat(url);};this.getCacheObjectType=function(){return _this._cacheObjectType;};this.getCacheKey=function(){return _this._cachekey;};this.dataCacheType=function(){return _this._dataCacheType;};/**
